comments_since_last_sample.body: What is this a video for adhd ridden children?

I dont comment because whatever I usually want to say it's probably already down there. But the editor did such a good job I spat on my screen I laughed so hard. Please give that guy a raise or in the very least have them edit every video, seriously keep it up!
That cliff hanger of a ending though......... man had me looking like PurpleCliffe by the end, chips and all xD
Guess who has ptsd on Registee
Mikey's "ha ha it is I" gives me life
